com.nyteshade
Class EmbedWeb.ParameterFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.net.httpserver.Filter
      com.nyteshade.EmbedWeb.ParameterFilter
Enclosing class:
EmbedWeb
public static class EmbedWeb.ParameterFilter
extends com.sun.net.httpserver.Filter

A nice filter which takes the dirty work out of obtaining parameters in a given HttpHandler. This bit of code was written by Leonardo Marcelino. The site from which it was referenced is leonardom.wordpress.com with the path /2009/08/06/getting-parameters-from-httpexchange.
